title: CAN WE PLEASE HAVE A SERVER IN AFRICA!!!
body: all I want is better ping. {{sticker:cass-cry}} Riot PLS

replies.body: server locations are based on player density
Considering how long it took for players on the east coast of NA to get servers closer to them for better ping, don't hold your breath.
Yes now west coast gets chit ping and east is ungrateful and bad anyway LOL.
No market there, which is why.
There's a Toto reference here somewhere...
i think there was something bout a server for the middle east. i guess depending in what part of africa that might be helpful
